experience.description: Lead engineer for Trinity RGMx Platform, architecting 15+ microservices for global pricing, promotions, and supply chain operations. Resolved critical production SSL/auth issues, built Gurobi-powered simulation engines, and integrated CNAPP/CSPM security across pipelines.

Led development and team management for Cloud Security Posture Management (CSPM) solution. Architected robust on-premises multi-tenancy system with comprehensive RBAC. Integrated open-source security tools and mentored Python team on best practices.
Developed serverless APIs for financial data analysis and reporting. Designed upload manager for 500k+ record datasets. Created KPI Builder and prediction microservices for financial forecasting.

Built and deployed Django REST Framework projects at scale. Integrated AWS services (Route53, Fargate, RDS, Redshift). Implemented payment gateways, OTP auth, UPI integrations, and comprehensive CI/CD pipelines.
